lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: it is good way to do something nice for people, and you know where the money is going.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an antique and jewelry store. I also buy and sale Art, coins, watches, and cars.

lenders.name: Patrick & Fay
lenders.loan_because: We believe in "People Helping People".
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a credit union in Texas and make loans to individuals for the same reasons that Kiva makes loans available to people all around the world. Fay works as a public servant and helps those indiviuals who are in need.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something, and this is the "thing I can do" as an individual, that has the most impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a partner in a large custom cabinet shop in Michigan making quality furniture for the office and residential markets.

lenders.name: Clark and Marji
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an account administrator and work with health care institutions needing long-term loans to upgrade their services.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs help at one time or another to get a business going and for me it's so gratifying to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses run better.

lenders.name: caterina rindi
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can, because one day I may need a similar loan, and because I support women in business.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in education, teaching at elementary schools,  working at the university level, and with various non-profit organizations. Right now I'm trying to spread the word about the Sharing Economy and Collaborative Consumption.

lenders.name: Meagan & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We believe that the best assistance you can give someone is to make them self sufficient. In the hope that one day they can pay it forward to others.

lenders.name: Rollins
lenders.loan_because: We think this is a great way for our family to be engaged in the world we live in.

lenders.name: Jakob
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing. I thought I should loan money. It seems like you're a nice guy.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to kindergarten and I'm 5 years old.

lenders.name: Ariel
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my 6-year old brother how important it is to look outward at the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help schools build better, greener, healthier buildings for schoolchildren across America.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: A simple way to touch and improve lives.

lenders.name: Jeanie & EB
lenders.loan_because: We like seeing the recipients of our loans succeed. Each success is like ripples in the water because it touches many other lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired but trying to make more ripples.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can and am grateful for the opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: I play with my grandchildren, I have 8 and I love them all.

lenders.name: Becca and Bill
lenders.loan_because: Carpe Diem

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: I find joy in helping people out.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and research current international business issues.

lenders.name: jerome and diane
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Small law practice (Jerome) and Educator (Diane).

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
Why not?
People need a hand sometimes,things kind of work out that way.
lenders.occupational_info: Parcel delivery person.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
I'm blessed to have enough resources that I CAN help. 

Note: I do not make loans to people who contact me directly. Please do not misuse Kiva in this way.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at a university, where I teach introductory biology to students who are not majoring in the sciences. It's a real challenge, because so many of my students are terrified of science. What I try to do is teach them a few essential concepts, approach the topics in many different ways, and show them how science applies to their own lives.

On the side, I write books for children. Most of what I write is nonfiction books for schools and libraries on topics in science, technology, and crafts.

lenders.name: Elie
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: BEATRICE
lenders.loan_because: I am qualified and equipped to ascertain the level of poverty, appraise a project and a person.
lenders.occupational_info: I had developed poverty alleviation tools through which our trained staff will target the poor amongst our community.We designed various structured loan products.Developed systems and procedures and succesfully run a micro-finance programme in INDIA

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: it is the morally just thing to do.

lenders.name: Jeanene
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women help themselves and succeed economically.
lenders.occupational_info: At work, I manage a team of managers, software developers and analysts that build and support a business website.

lenders.name: Raelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world better.
lenders.occupational_info:
I made my first loan to a woman who sells toys and wants to pass her business on to her children.

My second loan was to a former school teacher who has children including one adoptee.

My third was to a woman who helps support her children by selling goods from her home.

My fourth was to a man who pays for his children's education by making and repairing jewelry.

My fifth loan was to a woman who sells newspapers and magazines, office supplies, and toys.

My sixth loan was to a group with a member who sells toys.

My seventh loan was to a man who sells toys and party supplies.

My eighth loan was to a woman with a toy store in a Mongolian bazaar.

My ninth loan was to a woman who wants to increase inventory at her toy store.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: A great way to help people help themselves - thanks to Kiva for making it possible.  A nice place to park your savings and put it to work - a much more satisfying "rate of return" than a savings account, especially nowadays!

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: every person's contribution matters, and I respect and choose to help people that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who manage various projects for a large information technology company.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: it's so little to do for so much good.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for a small (for now) company.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I can't resist the urge to make this kind of difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing, mostly like the instruments of a rock band or jazz band. I also build websites.

lenders.name: Yavonna
lenders.loan_because: I'm a long-time fan of microfinance. Kiva makes it easy to play a role.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses move their projects from vision to launch through idea validation, strategy & planning, and recruitment of a virtual support team.

lenders.name: Niko
lenders.loan_because: A great way to help somebody long-term.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this method. What an easy and effective way to give a hand.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I currently manage a shopping mall for an international company based out of Australia. I love what  I do and look forward to every day!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think that by providing money in that form to small entrepreneurs who can't otherwise get finance is the money is more likely to be effectively used than if it is given as charity
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher of the Alexander technique

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: I wan't to give hardworking people a chance to get something done.

lenders.name: Frans de Graaf
lenders.loan_because: By sharing my welfare, I hope to give prosperity
lenders.occupational_info: Optimalisation of water and sewage systems.

lenders.name: christian
lenders.loan_because:
I have the chance to be born in a wonderful country (France), to be free, and to run my own business.
It's just time to share some of my luck with entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: I've created a web agency, offering dedicated services to small companies

lenders.name: Ludo
lenders.loan_because: I live in a rich country, and think this is a perfect way too make a small contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: Voff!

lenders.name: Jess & Brian
lenders.loan_because: There are people who need the money more than we do.

lenders.name: Makaya
lenders.whereabouts: Lagny sur Marne Seine et Marne
lenders.loan_because: Je suis à la recherche de partenariats pour le développement d'une activité commerciale.
lenders.occupational_info: Je suis actuellement en phase de création d'entreprise et souhaiterai voir avec vous, dans quelle mesure pourrions-nous converger nos synergies.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It's great to help people start their own business by lending small amounts that even I can afford!

lenders.name: Per C.
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Vigleik M
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Andreas T. Waardal
lenders.loan_because: I want people to do somting god for the coming years.
lenders.occupational_info: Iam a Supervisor / Service Engineer for Crane and lifting equitmens on and offshore.

lenders.name: Ryan M
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites that businesses use to create more business and get more customers. I also create websites that help businesses operate more effectively such as digital paperwork & organization systems and marketing and promotions platforms.

lenders.name: TxBikeRider
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to recycle money and help break the chain of poverty in other countries.  There's nothing more empowering than being able to look at something you've accomplished on your own (with a little help from a friend).
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: As a sociology student, I find classism and poverty to be the most detrimental of all social ills, and I hope, through this small effort, I can be part of someone's solution.

lenders.name: DeShawn
lenders.loan_because: when you have it, it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: DIGBIJOY
lenders.loan_because: I want to study furthur , Iam an engineering student of 1st year but due to lack of money my education is now stopped
lenders.occupational_info: Iam an engineering student who wants to read furthur , but my education stop due to lack of money

lenders.name: Altman-Bodnick Family
lenders.loan_because: at this year's Passover seder, our family discussed different ways we could help those in need. After seeing a story on Kiva.org on Frontline World, we were inspired to participate.

lenders.name: Parker & Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I worked for an NGO involved in small business development and micro-lending and saw first hand the impact of empowering people to own and expand their businesses.

lenders.name: GRAHAM
lenders.loan_because: i want to contribute someting to society
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard, I work long

lenders.name: Elio
lenders.loan_because: Creo en este tipo de proyecto y pienso que es una de la forma que podemos ayudar a los demas.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I like to think that a hand up helps everyone as it's done me in the past so I wish to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: Software developer many years. Retired now and work mainly around my yard.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity for individuals with money to lend, even small amounts of money, to participate in the microlending revolution.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered Architect, and a proud graduate of Earlham College in Richmond, Indiana (www.earlham.edu).

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: Blessed to be born in US and have access to school loans. Now it is my pleasure to share the light!
lenders.occupational_info: Part social work - part fun!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because:
relationships are the framework of our community and of our small world.    
             
"When I was young, my ambition was to be one of the people who made a difference in this world.  My hope is to leave the world a little better for my having been there."                
--Jim Henson
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Africa in the early 1980s.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Albert Family
lenders.loan_because: microloans can change the life of one person.  It may seem like an insignificant loan, but for them, it might change their life.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my second year of medical school at The Ohio State University, learning to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Debwong
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that a little can go a long way. My husband & I are also self-employed, and understand the value of a "leg up" in starting their business. Making a positive differnce is the best thing that we can do in this life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell items on eBay, often worldwide, and also help as a photographer's assistant, digital imaging specialist and web designer for our business, Spring Mountain Gallery.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I are able to lend a hand.  Not a hand out, a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy homes.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to share our blessings.  What a positive opportunity, thank you.
lenders.occupational_info:
I control (operate) the movement of cargo trains.
We transport autos, coal, chemicals, appliances, etc..

lenders.name: sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have and my life, hence I would like to help others to have a chance of a beautiful life on earth.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: "For in truth it is life that gives unto life- while you, who deem yourself a giver are but a witness." - Kahlil Gibran

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: All sorts of people have helped me in the past and enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Own shoe stores and real estate business.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending and its possibilities. I believe Kiva has successfully developed a sustainable way of reducing poverty and I would like to contribute to their efforts to end world poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of international studies and political science at The College of New Jersey. I plan to study sustainable development in graduate school. Currently I am studying abroad in Valparaiso, Chile. I hope to work in the future with poverty reduction programs such as Kiva.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe that my financial capital should always be working.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping to understand the genetics of pregnancy.  My team is looking for genetic markers that predict pregnancy problems.  So.....I sign women up for our research and manage our samples.

lenders.name: PAUL
lenders.loan_because: This is great!
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites. I flush out ideas. I sell ideas.

lenders.name: Fox & Deb
lenders.loan_because: We have our health, a good marriage and a few dollars in the bank & with all that, believe it's important to help others at home and abroad.
lenders.occupational_info: Yesterday's history. Tomorrow's a mystery. Today's a gift, that's why we call it the present.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people to have a better life.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: TO IMPROVED THE QUALITY OF APICOLA'S PRODUCT AND HELP OTHER TO HAVE A BETTER LIVING.
lenders.occupational_info: AS A PRESIDENT OF APICOLA'S FOUNDATION OF THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, INC. I HELP TO GET FUNDS AND LOGISTIC HELP TO INCREASE THE WORK OF THE UNITY OF PRODUCTION FOR THE AFILIATED.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in investing in the lives of others as others have invested in me.

lenders.name: Joe & Frances
lenders.loan_because: As a family we are fortunate to have most of our needs met. We feel that these micro loans are a particularly efficient means to help others become self-sufficient and to know that in some small way our family will help another family meet their needs.
lenders.occupational_info:
Joe has worked in various aspects of entertainment for thirty years as Union   Craftsman and Independent Contractor. 
 Frances is part owner of a full service hair salon in California.  She has been an enthusiastic stylist for thirty years.

lenders.name: Preece
lenders.loan_because: I need to get involve, we are not alone ;-)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a art director working for magazines.Too much in front of my computer, but aware of the world I am living in. I love arts, travels, and making friends all over.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I have a little more than I need, some people have a little less,  I hope it balances out.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: A friend got me started and it's a fun and easy way to help entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with special needs students.

lenders.name: Curran Family
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself, I know the trials and tribulations of running a business. Being able to reach out to someone else that lacks the necessary funds and resources to grow their own business, is highly rewarding and truly necessary of those in the position to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a business that provides toner and ink cartridges to other suppliers and businesses around the United States & Canada.

lenders.name: dave
lenders.loan_because: Every bit makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase electronics components for a manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Byrd
lenders.loan_because: I loan in memory of my Dad, Byrd Miller.  Byrd was a happy free-spirited guy who inspired people to do their best.

lenders.name: Michel van den Hove
lenders.loan_because: "The only place where poverty should be is in museums." M Yunus

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Maybe 50 years ago, Clarence Jordan, founder of Koinonia, wrote, "What the poor need is not charity, but capital," and it's exciting to be able to fill that need. Just reading about the businesses and the other lenders makes me more hopeful about our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I edit reports about schools for a non-profit educational consortium. In my spare time, I try to fix the world by prompting one conscience or one imagination at a time.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because:
Soy un persona extremadamente afortunada.  He tenido y aprovechado oportunidades que muy poca gente en este mundo llega a tener.  He viajado por el mundo, he visto y vivido mucho mas de lo que 99% de la gente del mundo se da cuenta que existe.  Siento que es mi obligacion moral compartir e inspirar como muchas veces otra gente exitosa lo ha hecho por mi.  Asi que aqui tienen a un mexicano dispuesto a cambiar el mundo aunque sea un poquito.  Como dice el dicho, para el mundo uno no es mas que una persona, pero para una persona uno puede ser el mundo.  Que llegen al exito, y cuando lleguen, compartanlo.

---

I am an extremely fortunate person.  I have had, and taken advantage of, opportunities that very few people in this world get to have.  I have travelled the world, I have seen and experienced more things than 99% of this world's people even know exists.  I feel it is my moral obligation to share and to inspire, as many successful people have shared with and inspired me.  So you have a Mexican guy intent on changing the world, even if it is a little change.  Like the saying goes, to the world you are just a person, but to one person you might be the world.  May you achieve success, and when you do, share it.
lenders.occupational_info:
Desarrollo sistemas financieros de computo para organizaciones grandes, por ejemplo, bancos.  Tengo mi propia compañia de consultoria para hacer esto, y tambien ayudo a mis clientes a comenzar y crecer sus compañias.

---

I create financial computer systems for large corporations, such as banks.  I have my own consulting company to do this, and I help other people start and grow their own companies.

lenders.name: Paolo
lenders.loan_because: ok
lenders.occupational_info: ok

lenders.name: For Johan Droogmans
lenders.loan_because: In Memory of Johan Droogmans

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I'd like the world to be different than it is.
lenders.occupational_info: I make magazines.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I came to the US as a first generation immigrant and have been extremely blessed as an entreprenauer and businessman.  I know how hard it is to get started, and hopefully my little help will give someone a legup in life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is in the financial and realestate industry.  My primary business is an insurance brokerage house.  I also do a fair amount of real estate developement and rental realestate.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Why should Bono get all the credit?

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.occupation: Community Engagement at College of William & Mary
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference!  And I think we're all connected in this world in ways beyond our imaginations, so it's one way I can live out that connection.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students to make positive social change while learning about the world and themselves

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a small way I can help with the near the impossible problem of the global income gap.  It's a way for me to take some of the opportunities I've been given and try to help give them to someone else as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on health policy research; trying to find more efficient ways to provide health care services.

lenders.name: Stone
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people and I want them to be able to improve their lives.  People should help other people.  I think everyone should follow the Golden Rule.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am trying to make a positive difference in the world.  
I don't want to be part of the problem.....I want to help solve the problems.

lenders.name: James Davis
lenders.loan_because: kiva.org is a great example that I use in my class on "Technology Targeted at Social Issues"
lenders.occupational_info: Teach classes and do research on new technology meant to address social issues.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: Such a small contribution can make such a big difference.

lenders.name: tim
lenders.loan_because: Because some day we all need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: own a billing firm for attorneys. I spend a lot of time explaining my product and how it works because it is the first and only product to do what it does!

lenders.name: Aidan
lenders.loan_because: Using Kiva the loan recipient gets the cash directly without going through an expensive and bureaucratic layer of aid groups. Also the budding entrepreneurs are able to avoid the extortionate rates of interest routinely charged by commercial money lenders in poor countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an information technology company that was helped by generous private investors in the early stages of its development

lenders.name: Phung
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to ensure effective program design, so that it properly helps people and that it works.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I value empowerment, and the least I can do is make a small contribution to this ideal.

lenders.name: Henning
lenders.loan_because: ...micro credit works!

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I believe
lenders.occupational_info: I create training programs to help workers be able to perform better.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this might be the best way to help out the people who need and deserve assistance the most.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps other businesses advertise their products and services on Google, Yahoo and other major search engines.  We try to get them increased visibility and a better return on their investment.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I'm letting my 12-year-old sister choose which business owners we lend to so she can begin to think about others.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: the premal abides.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is important and helps others believe in the power of community. We are all connected to each other and the earth.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.occupational_info: Retail manager

lenders.name: Jack & Maria
lenders.loan_because: We read about Mr. Yunus making loans a few years ago and thought it was fantastic. We just realized how easy it is for us to make a difference in someones's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Jack works to help people who file bankruptcy to reorganize their debts and complete repayment plans. Maria works for Kaiser Permanente, a HMO with a heart.

lenders.name: Arlo
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to use my birthday money to help others.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupation: Mom, Actress, Box Office Mgr, Standardized Patient
lenders.loan_because: It's a hand up, not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: Part of my acting deals with being a teaching tool for medical students.  I portray various medical cases and the students practice with me.

lenders.name: parkuniversitymicroclass
lenders.loan_because: All of us are currently enrolled in a class studying Principles of Microeconomics instructed by Mr. Claude R. Robertson. Mr. Robertson brought in a newspaper article from the Arkansas Democrat Gazette featuring microfinancing. He challenged us to get involved in becoming financers. As a group we were able to raise enough money to make three loans. We would like our project to be a success and hopefully we will all be able to make loans individually and continue to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all students of Park University attending classes at the Little Rock Air Force Base Campus in Jacksonville, Arkansas.

lenders.name: Orrin
lenders.loan_because: Christ has helped me and given me the desire to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze data.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: i am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a fiber artist and mostly sew and sell my purses online. i also knit and crochet, make soap, and paint. i love all things fiber and love to trade with other artists.

lenders.name: The Ulloa Family
lenders.occupation: Herman is a TV News Photographer/Editor
lenders.loan_because: My family and I would like everyone to have a chance at living decent, honest lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's easy and very worthwhile
lenders.occupational_info: Try to help people with mental problems

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: Because I can...and I think it is important to loan to ambitious entrepeneurs that are giving back to their communities as well as their own families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an architecture firm where I design and plan office Interiors.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of microfinance to transform lives.  And, from my experiences growing up in the developing world, I know how much opportunity there is for change.
lenders.occupational_info: I market chocolate, which means I figure out what kinds of chocolate people want, how to best package it, what price to sell it at, and how to tell people about it.

lenders.name: Anuj
lenders.loan_because: Its a good way to give back to someone else.Plus I feel really good to help someone

lenders.name: Lai San
lenders.loan_because: It allows me be a part of the world.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I love giving chances to those who need it & want it.
lenders.occupational_info: Interactive marketing

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in those I lend to.  They inspire me and I honored to help them in any way I can :)

lenders.name: 99c.de
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to do what our team does....make people happy!
lenders.occupational_info: We digitally design the thoughts, ideas, and dream products of others.  We give their products wings to fly!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I work in international development. I enjoy the hospitality of great people around the world.  Supporting these entrepreneurs is one way I can give back to people who have been so helpful to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage development projects.  Presently in Washington DC studying Portuguese before starting my next posting in Brasilia, Brazil.

lenders.name: Sabine
lenders.loan_because: giving just a little makes all the difference for someone on the other side of the world. It means one less dinner for me but a new life for someone else.

lenders.name: Seandski
lenders.loan_because: Share the wealth. Help the world. Make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in advertising.

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.loan_because: the best way to support is helping people being able to support themselves

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying the Law to help people.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it is usefull

lenders.name: Salinas IT-Service GmbH
lenders.loan_because: We like to :-)
lenders.occupational_info: We work as  network consultants and instructors.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I believe that even for active and entrepreneurial persons a start capital is necessary to realize their ideas. This process should not be too difficult
lenders.occupational_info: Finding out what people need

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: I would help
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medical equipment all over europe.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I love the opportunity that Kiva gives me to make loans to people that I would otherwise not even know about.  It's fun to watch the payments come in and then reloan as they are paid back.  I had a jar of change at home and thought this was a great way to use that money!
lenders.occupational_info: Just enjoying life.  Learning and trying new things!

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I think that is a good system...
lenders.occupational_info: I support and help Canon photographers...

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute  helping others to improve their life and make a difference around them.

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: To help people lift themselfes out of poverty.

lenders.name: Wolf
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My work as an immigration attorney is helping people realize their dreams, be it in their home country or when they immigrate to the United States.

lenders.name: Per Vidar
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea

lenders.name: Joerg
lenders.loan_because: it's needed.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want the help others to stand on their own feets.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: The dollars I earn in the USA will make a bigger difference to people in other parts of the world than they will to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with archaeologists who research how people lived from 12,000 to 50 years ago.  My maps and graphics illustrate what people left behind.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I like to help dynamic people with good business ideas. The money we loan is not a big thing for us but for the people who get the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an eventmanager an organize sport- and galaevents for companies in germany.

lenders.name: Kolbjorn
lenders.loan_because: I believe more in active and direct investment, trade and business to dedicated and motivated individuals, than in traditional, passive aid to often corrupt officials.

lenders.name: Fiorenzo
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people

lenders.name: Dirk
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount, you can make a big choice for somebody

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: It feels GREAT to be able to help  people whom in spite of  their situation, have the spirit to start or develope a small business towards economic independence.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: just for fun!

lenders.name: Geri
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to receive a bit of much-needed help when beginning a business. I like the feeling of joy that comes in knowing that the person I've loaned to has succeeded, too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychologist, which means that I help people to solve their problems and improve their moods through therapy/counseling.

lenders.name: Allyson
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives and Kiva seems to  be the most direct method of finding those people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Learning Skills Teacher at a local technical college.

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: I would just like to help a bit...

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: It`s a great opportunity to help people, without resorces, develop their own business, Build their own future.

lenders.name: Jan Dagfinn
lenders.loan_because: I think it matters.

lenders.name: Knud
lenders.loan_because: I know from my experience with development institutions like the World Bank that they mostly don't address the real needs of the common people in the Global South.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm managing urgewald's program on the World Bank and other Multilateral Development Banks. My regional focus is Africa.

lenders.name: Philipp
lenders.loan_because: even if I know that it is not very intelligent to give loans at 0% interest rate, I do not follow the argument that this "destroys common lending structures and banks". This would be so, if there was a saturated market. But in fact there is so much need in financing, that often is not available (lack of securities, transaction cost) to the poor. And the Microfinance banks I know here in the country, they are really exclusive, borrowing money to a few "chosen ones". I think this is a good way, not to invest, but to give some charity, that matters and can bring forward self empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: Actually I am working in Tanzania in German development cooperation in the area of Public Private Partnerships, implementing medium and small scale projects in various sectors.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: We are lucky to be able to earn enough money to live. As a former Startup I know the problems to get money for business here, so I can imagine how difficult it is for the Enterpreneurs in the KIVA supported regions.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: fantastic idea, people are proactive entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: during my studies I was running my own advertising company for  8 years. I like the entrepreneurial idea behind!

lenders.name: Roe
lenders.loan_because: In loving memory of Byrd Miller, a quirky, fun-loving, free spirit who could find humor in anything. He loved a challenge. He inspired us all to laugh often & to be true to ourselves.

lenders.name: Hansjoerg
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm manager of the IT-Department of the
municipal libraries of munich

lenders.name: Beno
lenders.loan_because: I want to help reduce poverty in the world!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people have the right to access capital in order to improve their businesses and their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Deloitte Consulting's Federal Practice and provide strategic planning, program improvement, and grants management services to clients at the CDC.  I have my MPH and love how my work contributes to protecting the public's health and ensuring federal funds are used efficiently and effectively.

lenders.name: Alain
lenders.loan_because: Empowerment is the only way to really help people.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: it empowers others and I'm inspired by the entrepeneurs.  I love the idea that people who have never met, from across the world can help one another.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: If we don't help each other out. no one will. I want to pass that message on to my daughters.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional actor who lives and works in Saint Louis, MO, in the United States. In addition to my theatre work, I also work for the MBA programs at Washington University.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I believe hard working people everywhere deserve a chance to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher, school media specialist, and librarian until I retired in 2006.

lenders.name: Joann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired after a 50 year career in media: TV & Radio.

lenders.name: Mormon Youth Group
lenders.loan_because: It's a way of making a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Research Analyst--gather, process, and report information.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: My son recommended Kiva as a place to help other small entrepreneurs with their businesses.  I am blessed to be able to have a business of my own and I am eager to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run a used bookstore.  In 2007 my business burnt to the ground, and with the help of many people in my community and beyond I was able to reopen a few months later.  I am happy to pass on some of the blessings I have received.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: i am a self-starter who loves building things and want to help others do the same, hope we can learn from each other as we face the common challenges all entrepreneurs face, no matter how small the business
lenders.occupational_info: i manage a company that has created a consumer-financed voluntary fast pass for airport security

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Gale
lenders.loan_because: What an incredible way to have an impact all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a school to provide programs and education for the students.

lenders.name: OxfordMississippi.com
lenders.occupational_info: The sights, sounds, and stories of Oxford, MS

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant in New York City where I choose the wine for the wine list and recommend different wines to our guests to drink with their dinner.

lenders.name: Cesar
lenders.loan_because: If i dont do something good with the money now, I'll spend it on shoes and music cds.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a Web Designer :) I make pages like this one happen.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to prosper and live happy and healthy lives.

lenders.name: Penny and Bernie
lenders.loan_because: We think we have been very fortunate. We have received a helping hand in the past and want to offer a helping hand to others.

lenders.name: Chris, Kino, and Jennie
lenders.loan_because: Happiness:  ours and others.
lenders.occupational_info: one of us studies the politics of happiness; one helps students find jobs; and one is a high school student.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I see this as an opportunity to learn more about people in other countries, and to help someone who is already a self starter.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired, after 30 years working in natural resource management.

lenders.name: Balakrishnan
lenders.loan_because: I think thats my duty to the society
lenders.occupational_info: software engineer

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get off the ground
lenders.occupational_info: Development of new technologies and products in the internet space

lenders.name: John F.
lenders.loan_because: Assisting someone in making their lives a little bit better will hopefully make the world just that little bit more agreeable,

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see my money used by someone who can improve their lives and then pass the opportunity along to others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for computers.

lenders.name: Ajitha
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea and it makes me happy that I can make a difference to someone in need.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: This service enables the support of capitalism sans personal sacrifice.
lenders.occupational_info:
Judicious manager of violence

(U.S. Army)

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.occupation: Director of Developent for Houston READ Commission

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Some time ago, I met up with an ex-coworker who now works for World Vision.  He talked about his vision and some ways to help developing countries, one of which being microcredit.  I found the idea very intriguing, so I decided to join Kiva and contribute to the pool.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way that I can think of to directly support businesses that have social and economic impact in areas of need
lenders.occupational_info: Use technology and computer programs to help businesses both small and large

lenders.name: Omer
lenders.loan_because: I believe these are hard working and creative people trying to improve their family's life.

lenders.name: T. S.
lenders.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurmanship and found this great oppertunity to take part. I can lend money and in return borrow a share of a dream.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the finances for a nonprofit theater company.

lenders.name: Calamity
lenders.loan_because: my boyfriend thinks it's hot.
lenders.occupational_info: i help teens map their lives in relation to the world, in hopes that they will take more responsibility as a global citizen

lenders.name: Nicholas and Jess
lenders.loan_because: Credit is a critical barrier to self-mobilization.  Many of the development success stories we have come across have focused in part on improving access to credit.
lenders.occupational_info: We work on climate change adaptation and ecological restoration.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: It's great to support people's efforts to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Gabriella
lenders.loan_because: can be the way to give poor people the   chance to have projects and realize them

lenders.name: Tanja
lenders.loan_because: people in rich nations have the responibility to do soemthing for people in developping countries.
lenders.occupational_info: My business is finding out where, why and how to bring the ads that the creatives developped in newspaper, TV, radio, any press etc. I do this for a bank in Germany. After a media flight the researcher can find out how effective the investment was. Very interesting!

lenders.name: Jeanne and Tom
lenders.occupational_info: I study ways to make crops produce more fruit, survive with less water, and grow in poor soil.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I didn't make it up, but I agree with it completely: Do to others as you would want them to do to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell collectibles, mostly books and movies, but sometimes clothes and memorabilia.

lenders.name: Hasib
lenders.occupation: Application System Developer and Business Owner

lenders.name: Trond & Tirza
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people

lenders.name: Dann
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a branch manager.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I choose to

lenders.name: Calysta
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much in my life and I continue to be blessed in many ways by other people.  As the saying goes, to those who much has been given, much is expected.  I am also very excited about the idea that my contribution, however large or small, can directly have an impact on someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I love acting on stage and in film.  I also love yoga and I am currenlty training to become a yoga teacher.  I am also involved in making my community a better place.

lenders.name: cheri
lenders.loan_because: if you give someone bread, she'll eat for a day.  if you help her start a business, she'll feed herself, her family, and her community.
lenders.occupational_info: i worked as a professional librarian all my life until retirement.  now, i take care of my grown children and my dog.

lenders.name: Emily & David
lenders.loan_because: I like imagining that one person can make at least a small difference in the world.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I care about growing businesses and i hope that my contributions to them will be helpful towards a becoming closer to a happy lifestyle as well as an on-growing business
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school student in Washington State.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: Kids gotta read good
lenders.occupational_info: I handle public relations for non-profits and foundations

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: This is the greatest idea ever and I only wish my tax dollars could go to something this worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: traveling around. SE Asia right now.

lenders.name: Scott & Lisa
lenders.occupation: Executive Director of a Homeless Shelter

lenders.name: DiAnne
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: My days are spent helping in my family business and helping to protect the environment by practicing stewardship of our natural habitat.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: So much charity giving is like adding money to a black hole & you never find out where or to whom your money was given. Kiva.org gives loan providers ample transparency and the benefit of being able to select the people you believe you can help most
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major bank figuratively & geographically located on Wall St in New York, USA. I work in their Equity division as the Chief Operating Officer of the equity derivatives business.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I believe this empowers the receivers, spiritually as well as financially.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes in Yoga that include ways to move the body to increase flexibility and release tensions held in the spine. This allows us to live life in an open way, with less pain in the body, mind, and spirit.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Someone has to.
lenders.occupational_info: I process derivative trades.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: "...see that you also excel in this grace of giving." (see 2 Corinthians 8:7)
lenders.occupational_info: ...using a computer to draw mechanical parts and assemblies for manufacturing.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I work at home

lenders.name: Suzy
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel a little more hopeful about humanity
lenders.occupational_info: i am a gynecologist practicing in brooklyn.

lenders.name: Luca
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am withouth the help from others,  this is a small way to do my bit for people working hard to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Alessio
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the quality of life in third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in the preferential option for the poor.  By living simply and participating in endeavors such as this, I hope to empower others and help break the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am committed to providing pastoral care to those in need, both locally and globally.

lenders.name: Fraser
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that shrink wraps poodles for international transport.

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: 100% of my loan reaches its destination.  I'm not writing a check to a nameless, faceless charity; I am loaning real money to a real person who wants to move up in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Shipyard work.

lenders.name: Munir
lenders.loan_because: this is a powerful way to help others improve lives and change the world in a small way...
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and manage a business program in a public university...I am interested in entrepreneurship and the work of social entrepreneurs...I hope one day I can be one.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: When I visited Tanzania, I saw first hand the tremendous need and how small of a sacrafice I would have to make to have such a positive impact on the lives of others.  I could not live with myself if I didn't help!

lenders.name: Yami
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change one person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an administrator in a private university.  My job is to make sure that all the students have a successful college experience.

lenders.name: Andrey
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student majoring in Mathematics & Computer Science.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I don't know of a better way to help someone fulfill their dreams and attain financial security. It gives me so much joy to know that I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people end their suffering by getting in touch with their real feelings.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I believe those of us who are blessed with much are called to help those who are less fortunate. It makes me feel good to give a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired professor of agricultural economics. My specialty is trying to make agricultural markets work better.

lenders.name: Jimmy Hong
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  The contribution I set aside is an investment; I may not see significant profits, but my investment can return so much more to the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I have three ares of focus in my life. I am a student studying at the University of Saskatchewan, I teach many students how to play music on the piano, and I also help manage a restaurant.

lenders.name: Jeff,Val&Olivia
lenders.loan_because: We've been given everything, it's time to give it back.

lenders.name: Jeff and Rachel Webb
lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our children the value of helping those that want help, not those that want a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been fortunate in the restaurant business. I know how it feels to have an idea, to have to beg for money and to have people doubt you. I've also had the pleasure of having a few believe in me and proving to them what hard work can accomplish. How could you not want to help someone in this world, in "our" world to better themselves.

lenders.name: Karen & Chico
lenders.loan_because: We're big fans of the original microcredit program in Bangladesh.  We believe this is an excellent way of making a positive contribution at the grassroots level.
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture giftware and home decor products for companies around the world.

lenders.name: Ange
lenders.loan_because: As a resident of a wealthy country, I think I have a responsibility to assist others in improving their own lives and the lives of those in their local community.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: "The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands, then work outward from there." Robert Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance. I think Kiva provides a wonderful opportunity to, "...work outward from there" by helping others.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in the U.S., where the system exists  to support entrepreneurial efforts, and where we have abundant resources of all kinds. I have been very lucky to have had a measure of success with a combination of my own efforts and with the help of many, many giving and creative people over the last few years. This is just one small way that I can pay back some of that help--by helping others to become more self-sufficient and hopefully reach their own success.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small companies discover and refine their market positioning and messaging.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: The Jewish tradition calls for each person to Tikkun Olam, to heal the world. It is our duty and pleasure to give a hand to those who want to work to better themselves and their families. This act allows us to participate in the continuation of creation and to make the world a better place.  Kiva is truly a great way to help others because it efficiently gets microloans in the hands of entrepreneurs in places where such loans are unavailable and builds a personal bond between fellow lenders and entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I motivate and help everyone work together, grow and do their best to achieve our business goals, while having some fun too.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I've finally found a way to make capitalism work for good instead of evil.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: It is my duty as a human to share what extra wealth I have with those who really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Unemployed but doing what little I can for those who are less fortunate than I.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
It seems such an easy thing to do.  You don't have to be wealthy to contribute and even quite a small amount means so much to the person who receives it.

Thanks for the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the disability/accessibility policy area, with some fairly amazing people.

lenders.name: Mary Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the support of others along my own life journey.  I love being able to assist others in theirs.  I particularly like the concept of "residual giving."
lenders.occupational_info: I "show up" in my life each day: alive, awake, and aware; willing to experience and grow from whatever life brings my way.  I then share what I've learned with others.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it helps :-)
lenders.occupational_info: technical head in a swiss educational enterprise

lenders.name: David K
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to give something back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a programmer in the financial industry.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me
lenders.occupational_info: My children are everything

lenders.name: Mark Yak
lenders.loan_because: I want to operate a computer training business in my home village in southern Sudan. I want to provide the poor students with a technical and professional skills that will enable them to compete in job market.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to open a computer Training Centre, enrole the students and train them on how to operate the computer.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: It has taken a long time for me to find a route to invest in individuals and have a clear idea who is being helped.
lenders.occupational_info: I managed Radio Stations for many years. Now I am semi-retired and a director within our National Health Service

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's a powerful way to help with a small amount of money

lenders.name: Roli
lenders.loan_because: It´s a good idea to help people getting along in life and to cross barriers.
lenders.occupational_info: Pretty useless regarding the real problems of mankind.

lenders.name: alex Papanastassiou
lenders.loan_because: Cent by cent it makes a huge difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people succeed in business and businesses succeed in their industries having people's quests as starting point for value creation.

lenders.name: Carson
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I just go to Plymouth Whitemarsh High School and am currently in tenth grade.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to have a high impact on peoples' lives that I would be unable to achieve anywhere near as effectively. I want the world to become what governments are not allowing it to be.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of peoples' vision to allow them to better see the wonders of our beautiful planet.

lenders.name: Anne and Tom
lenders.loan_because: By luck of birth we have much compared to others in the world.  Time to "give back"!
lenders.occupational_info: Tom is a highway engineer and Anne is a painter.

lenders.name: Terje
lenders.loan_because: I am able to, and I like watching businesses grow.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the help that I've received in my life and want to return the favor to others.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I love this way of knowing who you loan to. If I get the money back, I will loan everything out to other cool projects again!!
lenders.occupational_info: Im travelling all over the globe

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I can. I have been blessed in my life and am paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Preserving and making local history available to anyone who asks for it.

lenders.name: dawn
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someone's life

lenders.name: Mike & Jenn Berry
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: sales & nonprofit work

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people helping people as directly as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science and maths to middle school (12-14 year old) students.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: investing in people is much more rewarding than investing in corporations.
lenders.occupational_info: As a geologist, I try to understand the structure and evolution of the rocks in the earth.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate. Yet others who work harder than me, are more intelligent than me and are more creative than me are less fortunate.  I'm trying to create equity.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who work on helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Give the shirt off your back.  I have.  Everything is just borrowed here on Earth anyhow.

lenders.name: Shova
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are in need.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the "little guy" try to make it in this big business world of ours.
lenders.occupational_info: I ran my own picture framing business for 18 years until I was forced to close amd retire due to a physical disabilty.

lenders.name: RICHARD
lenders.loan_because: I think that this is a great way to help people and continue to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: My joy is to help people help themsleves.

lenders.name: Reese
lenders.loan_because: it feels good!

lenders.name: Siona
lenders.loan_because: I live.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories that help create a new future. I facilitate people in connecting more deeply with themselves and to each other. I help others become aware of how they're spending their lives, and their money.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Inspiring and empowering entrepreneurs in developing nations is one of the most powerful ways to affect global change.
lenders.occupational_info: I have fun inspiring and empowering peeps.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people start their own businesses and becoming self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in the US start their own businesses too, by renting them a shared office space for a very inexpensive price.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I can and should.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Wonderful

lenders.name: Nancy Swain
lenders.loan_because: others have helped me and I want keep that spirit of trust going.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as the office manager at a county fairgrounds. I pay the bills, draw up agreememts for people renting  the buildings and manage our website and correspondence.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that I am having a direct impact on the lives of individuals. Money goes directly to a person, not a government.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do and a friend showed me how easy it can be done with Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Project management of technology projects for a global transportation company.

lenders.name: Adele
lenders.loan_because: life is way too short to bother with money problems. I believe that the only way to live happy is to share what we have. It's exciting to share people's dreams. And eventually make this world a litlle kinder.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a "clown". I try to do my duty at entertaining  people and myself. I am working at making my dreams come true.

lenders.name: jen
lenders.loan_because: "How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving, and tolerant of the weak and the strong. Because some day in life you will have been all these."  - GW Carver

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: we can change the world one person at a time -- and it starts with me.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories about how Americans live and have lived.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: People need money to make money.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell publishing services to large companies.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: it is fair
lenders.occupational_info: I paint with oil on canvas. Mostly figurative.

lenders.name: Harvey
lenders.loan_because: I want my grandchildren to live in a better world.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have much to be thankful for in life and I want to share what I have with those who don't have the resources necessary to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is leisure compared to what many people have to do to just stay fed, housed and clothed. I answer phones, make appointments and file papers.

lenders.name: Keary
lenders.loan_because: It pleases me to know that I can help.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: the world is full of talented and energetic people with outstanding business ideas that just need some initial capital to get things started.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from my career with the federal government and now we have a small farm in West Virginia.  We raise raspberries, blackberries, and currants as well as many other vegetables.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: When the entrepreneurs are strong, the terrorists are weak.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: In some small way, just maybe, I can help contribute to someone’s future helping them become independent and confident about their life.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired, but do part-time consultant work. I am involved with computers, insurance contracts and small websites.

lenders.name: jennie
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I write plays, I act and I make documentaries for people.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune, help others to improve their quality of life, and realize success in their business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an internal auditor for a software company.  The company makes software for businesses and individuals to help them manage their finances.  I perform reviews to ensure that the company is identifying and managing risks to achieving its business objectives.

lenders.name: Tanguy
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for everybody.

lenders.name: Robert B.
lenders.loan_because: I'm not rich, but compared to so many people, I know that I am very blessed and fortunate.  Lending through Kiva allows me to help others who just want to earn a living, and that's a great feeling.

lenders.name: The Graggs
lenders.loan_because: It is hard to get started without a little help from your friends.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Raf
lenders.loan_because:
money makes the world go round :-)

let's empower people directly and help them to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social entrepreneur, who is trying to make a difference.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I like helping other people who make an effort to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software for people to buy and sell music over the Internet.

lenders.name: Shira & Marc
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a little help getting started.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we just need a little help to get to our next goal.  I have been there and know what it means to get the help I needed.

lenders.name: Winny
lenders.loan_because: I like to help and see people succeed!

lenders.name: Josh and Kayla
lenders.loan_because: the love and mercy of Jesus compels us to use our lives and resources for the benefit of others
lenders.occupational_info: high school teacher and oncology nurse at Oregon Health Science University (OHSU)

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time at my computer writing, and I work with women in need.

lenders.name: Rauno
lenders.loan_because:
Enterpreneurship will cure the world from poverty. 
I'm happy if my small contribution will help some good ideas to come true.

lenders.name: Luigi
lenders.loan_because: It is time we all start acting like citizens-of-the-world and help each other directly.  Aid from large organizations and governments never gets into the hands of  the people who need it the most.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a group that provides money for medical care for poor people in the US living with HIV/AIDS.  I am also very active in the US antiwar movement.

lenders.name: Bruce & Mary
lenders.loan_because: Small business is the backbone of any community and needs all the help it can get particularly in poor countries. May the Lord richly bless all these hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info:
We build homes and commercial properties and or renovate them. 
We belong to the Lions organisation so have a strong knowledge of those who need a hand up in life.  This Kiva lending system is a great way for us to help on a micro basis, but make a big difference. Thanks for this great opportunity.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed so they, in turn, can help their families and their communities.

lenders.name: esaruoho
lenders.loan_because: the 25$ can be recycled so many times it's beyond ridiculous to not loan.
lenders.occupational_info: i sometimes translate or writeup stuff or maybe update a webpage for a friend. or do some tunes.

lenders.name: Azlan
lenders.loan_because: I love to see it grow in value
lenders.occupational_info: Create opportunities for people to take risk to find value in their life and chosen path.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that microlending works and that a little help goes a long way! :)

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of empowering women to change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a non-profit organization that helps Women with Disabilities have equal healthcare.  We work to educate doctors, change policy and increase self-advocacy skills.

lenders.name: Kimi
lenders.loan_because: It's fun -- and it only takes a little bit to help someone a lot!
lenders.occupational_info: Assistant City Editor at the Los Angeles Times

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I know there are times in life when people need help. I have traveled around the world and I have seen that sometimes all it takes is a little help to make a big change.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English at a U.S. university. My students do not speak English as their first language, but they are living in the U.S. and attending my univerity. My job is to teach the skills that will help them meet their goals.

lenders.name: The Curryer
lenders.loan_because: We've been with Kiva for a few years now (Formerly Dustin). We want to share with others the possibilities and doors that can be opened through through industry and thrift.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell various curries and street foods to our customers in Downtown Salt Lake City, and we enjoy doing it.

lenders.name: Ariel
lenders.loan_because: We all need to work together
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Reference Librarian in the Nashville [Tennesee] Public Library.  I help people find the answers to their questions in books, periodicals and on the Internet.  I also help teach people how to use computers and how to do their own research.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: You can "Give a man fish and feed him for a day; Teach him to fish and feed him for life."
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my second year as a student at the University of Rhoded Island studying economics and finance.  In the summer i work as the kitchen manager at a YMCA Day Camp for children.

lenders.name: 0101craign0101
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help others improve their lives. Kiva helps borrowers build and sustain economic success.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around...
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an English teacher in Tokyo, Japan.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do, and it makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to draw pictures and sell copies of them to thousands of people over the Internet.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I can. After living and working for serveral years in the Caribbean and South America, I saw how far only a few dollars can go.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a team of computer software programmers.

lenders.name: DrSted
lenders.loan_because:
I know that not all people were given the advantages I was.
And I think loaning is more affective than charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I design tools that get oil out of the ground.

lenders.name: Marge
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance investing is a productive and ennobling way to address poverty in Third World countries.
lenders.occupational_info: As a middle school English teacher, I encourage  my students to appreciate words in all forms--reading, writing, speaking, and listening.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: The world’s poor have no collateral and traditional banks are not interested in issuing small loans — here is where we come in: $25 to $100 can make a difference and we can all help...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology, building and supporting systems that help businesses work more efficiently.

lenders.name: Catherine Austin
lenders.loan_because: ...what Kiva is doing is terrific. I would like to learn more about how it works and how I can support this and similar efforts. So time to jump in the water and start loaning!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping families and communities build real wealth.

lenders.name: Tara Rodden Robinson
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the abundance I have been blessed with.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm The Productivity Maven.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It is up to those with plenty to do for those in need. It is our privilege and our obligation.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring people with different talents together to combine their efforts to create something greater than any one person can do alone.

lenders.name: CitaAnn
lenders.loan_because: I want my retirement money to be put to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from Texas Public Schools; I am now the caretaker for my elderly parents. I have four children and eight grandchildren.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make the best use of their money.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Benefitting from the privilege of living and working in the USA, I want to give to those with less.
lenders.occupational_info: I work doing talk therapy... helping people who suffer by talking through problems.  Its a start.
